title: Z&L Home Linen Burlap Table Runner Dresser Scarves, Marble Texture Table Runners for Dinner Holiday Party, Wedding, Events, Kitchen Decor Watercolor Abstract Art 14x72Inch
features: SUPERIOR FABRIC: This festival table runner made of cotton linen. It will not stick your skin when having dinner, not hot and humid, breathable.

MODERN FASHION DESIGN: This is natural fashion table cloth features elegant floral printed in premitive linen fabric, which will add a touch of splash to any existing home kitchen inside outside dining room living table hall refectory restaurant hotel dinner decor. Suitable for dinner table, coffee tabletop, patio, gardens, book desk, storage table etc, indoor or picnic outdoor.

EASY TO CARE: Machine wash in cold water, gentle cycle, wash similar colors together, line dry recommended to avoid shrinkage and air dry is the best for drying since polyester dries relatively quickly.(Machine wash cold delicate, hand wash best; lay flat to dry).
SERVICE: 100% Satisfaction Guarantee: Welcome to contact with us if you have any questons.
description: Our table covers are ideal for your everyday use, wedding, bachelor, birthday, graduation party, backyard parties, banquet, family gatherings, Thanksgiving Day/Christmas Eve holiday dinners.Specially made for elegant eating environments even private home use, also they are perfect gifts for a housewarming.Perfect rectangular accommodates the majority of buffet and dining room tables or tea table. Overall, it is an essential dining room centerpiece for get-togethers with friends and families.
We provide more size and vibrant colors for your choice to match your theme and they will not fade with personal care.
Made of Cotton Linen Materials:The cotton linen cloth is heat-resistant, wear-resistant, and has strong antistatic ability.The printed fabrics, fabric silky soft, durability, not wrinkle.

Care Instructions:Our table runner are easy to clean and you do not need to spend much time on it. Machine wash in cold water, gentle cycle, wash similar colors together, line dry recommended to avoid shrinkage and air dry is the best for drying since polyester dries relatively quickly.(Machine wash cold delicate, hand wash best; lay flat to dry).
Enjoy your dining experience with these durable tablecloths. Our tablecloth will dress up your tables for a dash of decorative elegance whether indoors or outdoors.
